=Message=
==Syntax==
{{{
Message,<message>,<Action> 
}}}

This command will pop a small text window displaying the contents of your message. The additional action parameter will allow you to customize the icon displayed along with the message box.

Action can have of the following values
 * Information
 * Confirmation
 * Error
 * Warning
*WB076 added:*
 Usually the message dialog waits for ever for the user's ok. You can cause to close it after a timeout, by adding the timeout (in seconds) as last argument.

== Example: == 
{{{
message,"Script has been completed!",Information,10 
}}}
